Package parkingRobot

Class IPerception.OdoSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkingRobot.IPerception.OdoSensor
  • Enclosing interface:
    IPerception
    public static class IPerception.OdoSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    supports processing of the Mouse-odometrysensor by recording the Shift in U-and V-direction since last call of getOdoMeasurement and the corresponding time interval. For every Sensor information receiver pair one specific OdoSensor object should be instantiated.
    Author:
    PMP

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) long CurrentTime  
      (package private) IPerception.OdoDifferenceMeasurement odoDiffMeas
      the angle that one wheel has turned since last request and the time between last an actual request.
      (package private) long ReferenceTime
      moment of time of last readout request - not used (timeinterval from arduino is used)

      OdoSensor()
      Constructor of the IPerception.OdoSensor Class Construction of the class starts the meausrement

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addShift​(double u, double v, int deltaT)
      adds the passed u- and v- shift and the timedifference between the last two measurements to the stored values
      IPerception.OdoDifferenceMeasurement getOdoMeasurement()
      returns the U-,V-Shift in mm since last request and the time between last an actual request bundled in an OdoDifferenceMeasurement object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • odoDiffMeas

        IPerception.OdoDifferenceMeasurement odoDiffMeas
        the angle that one wheel has turned since last request and the time between last an actual request. A new angle increment is added by addAngle. If this value is read by getOdoMeasurement it is reset to zero.

      • ReferenceTime

        long ReferenceTime
        moment of time of last readout request - not used (timeinterval from arduino is used)

      • CurrentTime

        long CurrentTime

    • Constructor Detail

      • OdoSensor

        public OdoSensor()
        Constructor of the IPerception.OdoSensor Class Construction of the class starts the meausrement

    • Method Detail

      • getOdoMeasurement

        public IPerception.OdoDifferenceMeasurement getOdoMeasurement()
        returns the U-,V-Shift in mm since last request and the time between last an actual request bundled in an OdoDifferenceMeasurement object
        Returns:
        OdoDifferenceMeasurement.uSum u-Shift since last call in mm, OdoDifferenceMeasurement.vSum v-Shift since last call in mm, OdoDifferenceMeasurement.deltaT time delta since last call in milliseconds

      • addShift

        public void addShift​(double u,
                     double v,
                     int deltaT)
        adds the passed u- and v- shift and the timedifference between the last two measurements to the stored values
        Parameters:
        u - the given U-Shift in mm
        v - the given V-Shift in mm
        deltaT - the time between the last two measurements
